definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: China's territorial land, inland water, territorial seas and territorial airspace are inviolable.
sentences.chinese: 中国的领陆，内水，领海，领空神圣不可侵犯。

sentences.english: The territorial issue remains the time bomb, Mr. Cole said.
sentences.chinese: 前美海军官员伯纳德说，领海问题仍是一个定时炸弹。

sentences.english: The ships were not expected to enter Israeli territorial waters.
sentences.chinese: 预计这些船只将不会进入以色列领海。

sentences.english: "Internal waters" means all sea areas on the land-ward side of the baseline of the China's territorial sea.
sentences.chinese: 内水，是指我国领海基线向内陆一侧的所有海域。

sentences.english: The two vessels, China Yuzheng 310 and China Yuzheng 201, did not enter Japan's territorial waters, Xinhuanet.com reported Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 两艘渔政船均未进入日本领海。

sentences.english: RN Ships and aircraft safeguarding the integrity of UK Territorial Waters and Airspace.
sentences.chinese: 护士船舶和飞机维护英国的领海和领空的完整性。

sentences.english: Turney was shown on the television admitting "illegal entry" into Iranian waters.
sentences.chinese: 在电视镜头上托内承认他们非法入侵了伊朗领海。

sentences.english: The drilling activity of this rig is within China's territorial waters.
sentences.chinese: 这台钻井平台活动范围是在中国领海内。

sentences.english: Boundary monuments built on East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 中国完成东海领海基点界标建设工作。

definition: Diaoyu Islands, claimed by China but controlled by Japan as the Senkaku Islands, also called the Pinnacle Islands
Spratly Islands, disputed between China, Malaysia, the Philippines, Taiwan and Vietnam
Paracel Islands, in the South China Sea
Huangyan Island (in the South China Sea)
United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea
pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Hai3 yang2 fa3 Gong1 yue1

definition: Ryukyu Islands/Okinawa 沖繩|冲绳[Chong1 sheng2] and other islands of modern Japan
